results.title: Simvastatin plus nitric oxide synthase inhibition modulates remote organ damage following skeletal muscle ischemia-reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ plus nitric oxide synthase inhibition modulates remote @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@ following skeletal muscle @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@ischemia-reperfusion injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Cowled PA, Khanna A, Laws PE, Field JB, Fitridge RA. Simvastatin plus nitric oxide synthase inhibition modulates remote organ damage following skeletal muscle ischemia-reperfusion injury. J Invest Surg. 2008 May-Jun;21(3):119-26. PMID: 18569431
citations.BibTeX: @article{18569431, title={Simvastatin plus nitric oxide synthase inhibition modulates remote organ damage following skeletal muscle ischemia-reperfusion injury.}, author={Cowled PA and Khanna A and Laws PE and Field JB and Fitridge RA}, journal={J Invest Surg}, volume={21}, number={3}, pages={119-26}}

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates cisplatin-induced kidney and liver damage in rats.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is beneficial in @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@kidney and liver dysfunction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ via prevention of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ peroxidation and @DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue@@@ @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@, preservation of antioxidant @CHEMICAL_Glutathione @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005978 @@@glutathione@@@, and suppression of neutrophil infiltration.

citations.NLM: Işeri S, Ercan F, Gedik N, Yüksel M, Alican I. Simvastatin attenuates cisplatin-induced kidney and liver damage in rats. Toxicology. 2007 Feb 12;230(2-3):256-64. PMID: 17196726
citations.BibTeX: @article{17196726, title={Simvastatin attenuates cisplatin-induced kidney and liver damage in rats.}, author={Işeri S and Ercan F and Gedik N and Yüksel M and Alican I}, journal={Toxicology}, volume={230}, number={2-3}, pages={256-64}}
